title: Camp Hell
description: Victor Bayne honed his dubious psychic skills at one of the first psych training facilities in the country, Heliotrope Station, otherwise known as Camp Hell to the psychics who've been guests behind its razorwire fence.Vic discovered that none of the people he remembers from Camp Hell can be found online, and thereâ€™s no mention of Heliotrope Station itself, either. Someone's gone through a lot of trouble to bury the past. But who?
author: Jordan Castillo Price
